nodes.bodyText: We normally don't mention the issue number on fixes. Shall we remove the issue number?
Shall we shorten the function names?
Do we need this comment? Shall we maybe improve it to indicate popping out the empty list added to the var list stack if no non-rest params are available?

Since recently, we've been trying to write the tests more in Ballerina. For example, 
  
    
      ballerina-lang/tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/resources/test-src/expressions/mappingconstructor/spread_op_field.bal
    
    
         Line 31
      in
      133d901
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public function testMapRefAsSpreadOp() { 
        
    
  

.
Shall we try and do the same for the newly added tests?
